title: Finding the X-value of the Vertex
text: To determine the maximum height of the rock, we must find the x-value of the the vertex. Since we already have the equation, we can use the formula $$\frac{-b}{2} a$$ to find the x-value. $$\frac{-90}{-32}=3$$. So, the ball reaches its maximum height at 3 seconds.
